mapper.insert:
insert into school_score_limit( province_id, school_id, year, `min`, `type`, zslx, batch, name ) values
( #{score.provinceId}, #{score.schoolId}, #{score.year}, #{score.min}, #{score.type}, #{score.zslx}, #{score.batch}, #{score.name} )
on duplicate key update province_id=values(province_id), school_id=values(school_id), year=values(year), `min`=values(min), `type`=values(type), zslx=values(zslx), batch=values(batch), name=values(name)
